name: touchportal_icue
description: Node.JS interface from Touch Portal to Corsair iCue

scripts.build-win: pkg --targets node12-win-x64 . && move touchportal_icue.exe base/Win/TPCorsairiCue/ && copy node_modules\cue-sdk\prebuilds\win32-x64\* base\Win\TPCorsairiCue && del Installers\TPCorsairiCue-Win.tpp && cd base\Win && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPCorsairiCue-Win.tpp TPCorsairiCue && cd TPCorsairiCue &&  for /f %F in ('dir /b /a-d ^| findstr /vile ".png .tp"') do del "%F"
scripts.build-mac: pkg --targets node12-macos-x64 . && move touchportal_icue base/Mac/TPCorsairiCue/ && copy node_modules\cue-sdk\prebuilds\darwin-x64\* base\Mac\TPCorsairiCue && del Installers\TPCorsairiCue-Mac.tpp && cd base\Mac && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPCorsairiCue-Mac.tpp TPCorsairiCue && del TPCorsairiCue\touchportal_icue && cd TPCorsairiCue && for /f %F in ('dir /b /a-d ^| findstr /vile ".png .tp .sh"') do del "%F"

author: Jameson Allen (aka Spdermn02)
